11.request ç½‘ç»œè¯·æ±‚

YLå¤§çº¦ 16 åˆ†é’Ÿ
æ­¤é¡µå†…å®¹
  • 1ï¼Œrequest æ¨¡å—
    • 1-1ï¼Œresponse çš„å¸¸ç”¨å±æ€§ï¼š
    • 1-2ï¼Œ response.text å’Œ response.content çš„åŒºåˆ«
    • 1-3ï¼Œä¸‹è½½å›¾ç‰‡å®ä¾‹

11.request ç½‘ç»œè¯·æ±‚

1ï¼Œrequest æ¨¡å—

1-1ï¼Œresponse çš„å¸¸ç”¨å±æ€§ï¼š

1ï¼Œresponse.text  #å“åº”ä½“ strç±»å‹response.encoding  #ä»HTTPã€€headerä¸­çŒœæµ‹çš„å“åº”å†…å®¹çš„ç¼–ç æ–¹å¼
2ï¼Œrespones.content #å“åº”ä½“ bytesç±»å‹
3ï¼Œresponse.status_code #å“åº”çŠ¶æ€ç ,
4ï¼Œresponse.request.headers #å“åº”å¯¹åº”çš„è¯·æ±‚å¤´
5ï¼Œresponse.headers å“åº”å¤´,
6ï¼Œresponse.cookies #å“åº”çš„cookieï¼ˆç»è¿‡äº†set-cookieåŠ¨ä½œï¼‰
7ï¼Œresponse.url  #è·å–è®¿é—®çš„url,
8ï¼Œresponse.json() #è·å–jsonæ•°æ® å¾—åˆ°å†…å®¹ä¸ºå­—å…¸ (å¦‚æœæ¥å£å“åº”ä½“çš„æ ¼å¼æ˜¯jsonæ ¼å¼æ—¶)
9ï¼Œresponse.ok

  # å¦‚æœstatus_codeå°äºç­‰äº200ï¼Œresponse.okè¿”å›Trueã€‚
  # å¦‚æœstatus_codeå¤§äº200ï¼Œresponse.okè¿”å›Falseã€‚

# å…ˆå®‰è£… reqeuests
import requests
# ç»™å®šæŠ“å–çš„ç½‘å€çš„url
url = 'http://www.baidu.com'
# å‘èµ·getè¯·æ±‚
response = requests.get(url)

# çœ‹ä¸€ä¸‹å“åº”çš„çŠ¶æ€ç 
print(response.status_code)
# çœ‹ä¸€ä¸‹è¯·æ±‚çš„url
print('response.url', response.url)
# è·å–ç¼–ç 
print(response.encoding)
# è®¾å®šç¼–ç 
# response.encoding = 'GBK'
# response.encoding = 'UTF-8'
# response.encoding = response.apparent_encoding

# çœ‹ä¸€ä¸‹è¿”å›çš„æ•°æ®  ä»¥å­—ç¬¦ä¸²å½¢å¼è¿”å›çš„ï¼ˆä¸€èˆ¬æƒ…å†µä¸‹ä¼šä¹±ç  éœ€è¦ç»™å®šç¼–ç ï¼‰
print(response.text)

# è·å–bytes
print( response.content)
print(response.content.decode()) # ä½¿ç”¨é»˜è®¤è§£ç æ–¹å¼
print(response.content.decode('UTF-8')) # ä½¿ç”¨é»˜è®¤è§£ç æ–¹å¼
print(response.content.decode('GBK')) # ä½¿ç”¨é»˜è®¤è§£ç æ–¹å¼

# è·å–å“åº”å¤´
print(response.headers)

# è·å–å“åº”å¯¹åº”çš„è¯·æ±‚å¤´
print(response.request.headers)

print(response.ok)

# è·å–JSONæ•°æ®
print(response.json())

1-2ï¼Œ response.text å’Œ response.content çš„åŒºåˆ«

## response.text

# ç±»å‹ï¼šstr
# è§£ç ç±»å‹ï¼š requestsæ¨¡å—è‡ªåŠ¨æ ¹æ®HTTP å¤´éƒ¨å¯¹å“åº”çš„ç¼–ç ä½œå‡ºæœ‰æ ¹æ®çš„æ¨æµ‹ï¼Œæ¨æµ‹çš„æ–‡æœ¬ç¼–ç 
# å¦‚ä½•ä¿®æ”¹ç¼–ç æ–¹å¼ï¼š`response.encoding="gbk/UTF-8"`
## response.content

## ç±»å‹ï¼šbytes
## è§£ç ç±»å‹ï¼š æ²¡æœ‰æŒ‡å®š
## å¦‚ä½•ä¿®æ”¹ç¼–ç æ–¹å¼ï¼š`response.content.deocde("utf8")`

è·å–ç½‘é¡µæºç çš„é€šç”¨æ–¹å¼ï¼š

response.content.decode()
response.content.decode("UTF-8")
response.text

## ä»¥ä¸Šä¸‰ç§æ–¹æ³•ä»å‰å¾€åå°è¯•ï¼Œèƒ½å¤Ÿ100%çš„è§£å†³æ‰€æœ‰ç½‘é¡µè§£ç çš„é—®é¢˜
## æ‰€ä»¥ï¼šæ›´æ¨èä½¿ç”¨`response.content.deocde()`çš„æ–¹å¼è·å–å“åº”çš„htmlé¡µé¢

1-3ï¼Œä¸‹è½½å›¾ç‰‡å®ä¾‹

import requests

# å›¾ç‰‡çš„URL
url = 'https://ww4.sinaimg.cn/mw690/0076vsZ6ly1hiw5krf9wdj31401hcb2a.jpg'
# å‘èµ·è¯·æ±‚
response = requests.get(url)
# å›¾ç‰‡ä½¿ç”¨wb
with open('dlrb.jpg', 'wb') as f:
    f.write(response.content)

1-4ï¼Œæ·»åŠ è¯·æ±‚å¤´

import requests

url = 'http://www.baidu.com'

## æ·»åŠ è¯·æ±‚å¤´
headers = {
    'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/118.0.0.0 Safari/537.36'
}
# æºå¸¦è¯·æ±‚å¤´
response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
# print(response.content.decode())
print(response.request.headers)

1-5ï¼Œget ä¼ å‚æ•°

1-5-1 ç¬¬ä¸€ç§æ–¹å¼

import requests

## url
## getå‚æ•°åœ¨URLé‡Œä»¥æŸ¥è¯¢å­—ç¬¦ä¸²å½¢å¼ä¼ é€’
url = 'http://www.zishazx.com/product?page=1&size_id=0&volum_id=0&price_id=2&category_id=1001&prize_id=0&pug_id=25#views'

# è®¾ç½®è¯·æ±‚å¤´
headers = {
    'User-Agent':'Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/118.0.0.0 Safari/537.36'
}

# å‘èµ·getè¯·æ±‚
response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

# è·å–è¿”å›æ•°æ®
data = response.content.decode()
print(data)
# å†™å…¥
with open('zsh.html', 'w', encoding='UTF-8') as f:
    f.write(data)

1-5-2 ç¬¬äºŒç§æ–¹å¼

import requests

url = 'http://www.zishazx.com/product'
# è®¾ç½®è¯·æ±‚å¤´
headers = {
    'User-Agent':'Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/118.0.0.0 Safari/537.36'
}
# é‹å¸¦çš„å‚æ•° getä¼ å‚
params = {
    'page': 1,
    'size_id': 0,
    'volum_id': 0,
    'price_id': 2,
    'category_id': 1001,
    'prize_id': 0,
    'pug_id': 25
}

# å‘èµ·getè¯·æ±‚  æºå¸¦äº† getä¼ å‚ æºå¸¦äº†headersè¯·æ±‚å¤´
response = requests.get(url, headers=headers, params=params)
# è·å–è¿”å›æ•°æ®
data = response.content.decode()
print(response.url)
# print(data)
# å†™å…¥
with open('zsh.html', 'w', encoding='UTF-8') as f:
    f.write(data)

1-6 å®æˆ˜æ¡ˆä¾‹

1-6-1 è·å–å›¾ç‰‡æ¡ˆä¾‹

import requests
from lxml import etree

url = 'https://app.mi.com/subject/115150'
headers = {
    'User-Agent':'Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/118.0.0.0 Safari/537.36'
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
data = response.content.decode()

tree = etree.HTML(data)
li_list = tree.xpath('//ul[@class="applist"]/li')
for li in li_list:
    # è·å–å›¾ç‰‡åœ°å€
    img_src = li.xpath('./a/img/@data-src')[0]
    # è·å–åç§°
    name = li.xpath('./h5/a/text()')[0]
    # è·å–ç®€ä»‹
    decr = li.xpath('./p/a/text()')[0]
    print(img_src, name, decr)

1-6-2 xpath ç´«ç ‚ä¹‹æ˜ŸæŠ“å–å•é¡µæ•°æ®

import requests
from lxml import etree

# è¦æŠ“å–çš„url
url = 'http://www.zishazx.com/product'
# ç»™è¯·æ±‚å¤´ ua
headers = {
    'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/118.0.0.0 Safari/537.36'
}
# å‘èµ·getè¯·æ±‚
res = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
# è·å–å“åº”çš„é¡µé¢å†…å®¹
data = res.content.decode()
# å®ä¾‹åŒ–åŒ¹é…å¯¹è±¡
tree = etree.HTML(data)
# print(data)
# è·å–åˆ°äº†æ‰€æœ‰çš„li
li_list = tree.xpath('//ul[@class="list clearfix"]/li')
for li in li_list:
    # è·å–åˆ°å›¾ç‰‡çš„srcåœ°å€
    img = li.xpath('./p[@class="img"]/a/img/@src')[0]
    name = li.xpath('./p[@class="name"]/text()')[0]
    p_no = li.xpath('./p[@class="p_no"]/text()')[0]
    print(img, name, p_no)

1-6-3 bs4 ç´«ç ‚ä¹‹æ˜ŸæŠ“å–å•é¡µæ•°æ®

import requests
from bs4 import BeautifulSoup

# è¦æŠ“å–çš„url
url = 'http://www.zishazx.com/product'
# ç»™è¯·æ±‚å¤´ ua
headers = {
    'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/118.0.0.0 Safari/537.36'
}
# å‘èµ·getè¯·æ±‚
res = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
# è·å–å“åº”çš„é¡µé¢å†…å®¹
data = res.content.decode()
# å®ä¾‹åŒ–åŒ¹é…å¯¹è±¡
soup = BeautifulSoup(data, 'lxml')
# print(data)
# è·å–åˆ°äº†æ‰€æœ‰çš„li
# li_list = tree.xpath('//ul[@class="list clearfix"]/li')
li_list = soup.find('ul', class_="list clearfix").findAll('li')
for li in li_list:
    # è·å–åˆ°å›¾ç‰‡çš„srcåœ°å€
    # img = li.xpath('./p[@class="img"]/a/img/@src')[0]
    img = li.find('p', class_="img").a.img['src']
    # name = li.xpath('./p[@class="name"]/text()')[0]
    name = li.find('p', class_="name").string
    # p_no = li.xpath('./p[@class="p_no"]/text()')[0]
    p_no = li.find('p', class_="p_no").string
    print(img, name, p_no)

1-6-4 xpath å°è¯´é˜…è¯»ç½‘

from lxml import etree
import requests

url = 'https://www.readnovel.com/category'
# ç»™å®šè¯·æ±‚å¤´
headers = {
    'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/118.0.0.0 Safari/537.36'
}
# å‘èµ·è¯·æ±‚
res = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
data = res.content.decode()
# print(data)
# å®ä¾‹åŒ–treeå¯¹è±¡
tree = etree.HTML(data)
# è·å–æ‰€æœ‰å›¾ä¹¦çš„li
li_list = tree.xpath('//div[@class="right-book-list"]/ul/li')
for li in li_list:
    # è·å–å°é¢
    img = li.xpath('./div[@class="book-img"]/a/img/@src')[0]
    # è·å–æ ‡é¢˜
    title = li.xpath('./div[@class="book-info"]/h3/a/text()')[0]
    # è·å–ç®€ä»‹
    intro = li.xpath('.//p[@class="intro"]/text()')[0]
    print(img, title, intro)

1-6-5 bs4 å°è¯´é˜…è¯»ç½‘

from bs4 import BeautifulSoup
import requests

url = 'https://www.readnovel.com/category'
# ç»™å®šè¯·æ±‚å¤´
headers = {
    'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/118.0.0.0 Safari/537.36'
}
# å‘èµ·è¯·æ±‚
res = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
data = res.content.decode()
# print(data)
# å®ä¾‹åŒ–treeå¯¹è±¡
soup = BeautifulSoup(data, 'lxml')
# è·å–æ‰€æœ‰å›¾ä¹¦çš„li
# li_list = tree.xpath('//div[@class="right-book-list"]/ul/li')
li_list = soup.find('div', class_="right-book-list").ul.findAll('li')
for li in li_list:
    # è·å–å°é¢
    # img = li.xpath('./div[@class="book-img"]/a/img/@src')[0]
    img = li.find('div', class_="book-img").a.img['src']
    # è·å–æ ‡é¢˜
    # title = li.xpath('./div[@class="book-info"]/h3/a/text()')[0]
    title = li.find('div', class_="book-info").h3.a.string
    # è·å–ç®€ä»‹
    # intro = li.xpath('.//p[@class="intro"]/text()')[0]
    intro = li.find('p', class_="intro").string
    print(img, title, intro)

1-6-6 xpath æŠ“å–ä¼˜ç¾å›¾åº“

import os
import random
import time

from lxml import etree
import requests

url = 'http://www.umeituku.com/bizhitupian/'
headers = {
    'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/118.0.0.0 Safari/537.36'
}

res = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
data = res.content.decode()
tree = etree.HTML(data)
# è·å–æ‰€æœ‰äºŒçº§æ ‡ç­¾é¡µçš„urlåœ°å€
a_list = tree.xpath('//div[@class="TypeList"]/ul/li/a/@href')
# åˆ›å»ºå›¾ç‰‡ç›®å½• å­˜å‚¨å½“å‰çš„å›¾ç‰‡
path= 'img'
if not os.path.exists(path):
    os.mkdir(path)
for url in a_list:
    # å¼€å§‹è®¿é—®äºŒçº§æ ‡ç­¾é¡µå†…å®¹
    res = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
    data = res.content.decode()
    tree = etree.HTML(data)
    try:
        # æ‰¾äºŒçº§æ ‡ç­¾é¡µå½“å‰å¤§å›¾çš„srcåœ°å€å’Œå›¾ç‰‡åç§°
        src = tree.xpath('//p[@align="center"]/a/img/@src')[0]
        alt = tree.xpath('//p[@align="center"]/a/img/@alt')[0]
        print(src, alt, 'å›¾ç‰‡ä¸‹è½½ä¸­======')
        # å›¾ç‰‡å­˜å…¥æœ¬åœ°
        with open(os.path.join(path, alt+'.jpg'), 'wb') as f:
            f.write(requests.get(src, headers=headers).content)
        print(src, alt, 'å›¾ç‰‡ä¸‹è½½å®Œæˆ......')
        # ç»™ä¸ªæ—¶é—´è‡ªçœ
    except Exception as e:
        print(f'åœ¨æŠ“å–ç½‘å€ï¼š{url}çš„è¿‡ç¨‹ä¸­å‡ºç°äº†é—®é¢˜ï¼Œ é—®é¢˜ä¸ºï¼š', e)
    time.sleep(random.randint(1, 4))
print('OVER  ä¸‹è½½ç»“æŸï¼')

1-6-7 æŠ“å–å†¶é‡‘ä¿¡æ¯

from lxml import etree
import requests

url = 'http://www.metalinfo.cn/mi.html'
headers = {
    'User-Agent':'Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/118.0.0.0 Safari/537.36'
}
"""
pageSize: 20
current: 2
resourceType: r_news
facetFilter: {}
order: desc
sort: sort_time
"""
res = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
data = res.content.decode()
tree = etree.HTML(data)
li_list = tree.xpath('//ul[@id="searchLists"]/li')
print(li_list)
for li in li_list:
    list_title = ''.join(li.xpath('//div[@class="list-title "]//text()'))
    list_intro = li.xpath('//div[@class="list-intro"]/text()')[0]
    list_keys = ''.join(li.xpath('//div[@class="list-keys"]/text()'))
    print(list_title, list_intro, list_keys)

1-6-8 å¼‚æ­¥è¯·æ±‚

from lxml import etree
import requests

url = 'http://www.metalinfo.cn/json/search/list'
headers = {
    'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/118.0.0.0 Safari/537.36'
}
# ä¼ é€’postæ•°æ®
data = {
    'pageSize': 200,
    'current': 1,
    'resourceType': 'r_news',
    'facetFilter': {},
    'order': 'desc',
    'sort': 'sort_time',
}
# å‘èµ·postè¯·æ±‚
res = requests.post(url, headers=headers, data=data)
# è·å–jsonæ•°æ®
json_data = res.json()['result']['records']
i = 0
for j in json_data:
    # è·å–æ ‡é¢˜
    title = j['title']
    # è·å–ç®€ä»‹
    r_abstract = j['r_abstract']
    print(title)
    print(r_abstract)
    i += 1
print(i)

1-6-9 ä¸­ä¿¡è¯åˆ¸æŠ“å–å•é¡µ

import requests
from lxml import etree

url = 'http://www.cs.ecitic.com/newsite/cpzx/jrcpxxgs/zgcp/index.html'
headers = {
    'User-Agent':'Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/118.0.0.0 Safari/537.36',
}

res = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
html = res.content.decode()
tree = etree.HTML(html)
li_list = tree.xpath('//ul[@class="list-con"]/li')
# print(li_list)
for li in li_list:
    con = li.xpath('./span/text()')
    th1 = con[0]
    th2 = con[1]
    th3 = con[2]
    th4 = con[3]
    th5 = con[4]
    print(th1, th2, th3, th4, th5)

2ï¼Œåæ‰’æªæ–½

2-1 ä»£ç†çš„ä½¿ç”¨

# ç”¨åˆ°çš„åº“
import requests
# å†™å…¥è·å–åˆ°çš„ipåœ°å€åˆ°proxy

# ä¸€ä¸ªipåœ°å€
proxy = {
    'http':'http://221.178.232.130:8080'
}

res = requests.get(url, proxies=proxy)
print(res.content.decode())

### ----------------------------------------------------------------------------

# å¤šä¸ªipåœ°å€
proxy = [
  {'http':'http://221.178.232.130:8080'},
  {'http':'http://221.178.232.130:8080'}
]

import random
proxy = random.choice(proxy) # éšæœºè·å–ip


res = requests.get(url, proxies=proxy)
print(res.content.decode())

2-2 å¤„ç† cookie

2-2-1 å¸¦ cookie çš„è¯·æ±‚

import requests

url = 'https://xueqiu.com/statuses/hot/listV2.json?since_id=-1&max_id=554225&size=15'
headers = {
    'User-Agent':'Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/118.0.0.0 Safari/537.36',
    'Referer': 'https://xueqiu.com/',
    ## æºå¸¦cookieä¿¡æ¯

2-2-4 æºå¸¦é¦–é¡µæœåŠ¡å™¨å“åº”çš„ cookie

import requests
# å°±æ˜¯ä¸ºäº†è·å–cookie

headers = {
    'User-Agent':'Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/118.0.0.0 Safari/537.36',
    'Referer': 'https://xueqiu.com/',
}

# è·å–cookie
cookies = dict(res.cookies)

url = 'https://xueqiu.com/statuses/hot/listV2.json?since_id=-1&max_id=554225&size=15'
# æºå¸¦cookieè¿›è¡Œè¯·æ±‚

1-6 æ‰“ç å¹³å°ä½¿ç”¨
import base64
import json
import requests
def base64_api(uname, pwd, img, typeid):
    with open(img, 'rb') as f:
        base64_data = base64.b64encode(f.read())
        b64 = base64_data.decode()
    data = {"username": uname, "password": pwd, "typeid": typeid, "image": b64}
    result = json.loads(requests.post("http://api.ttshitu.com/predict", json=data).text)
    if result['success']:
        return result["data"]["result"]
    else:
        #ï¼ï¼ï¼ï¼ï¼ï¼ï¼æ³¨æ„ï¼šè¿”å› äººå·¥ä¸è¶³ç­‰ é”™è¯¯æƒ…å†µ è¯·åŠ é€»è¾‘å¤„ç†é˜²æ­¢è„šæœ¬å¡æ­» ç»§ç»­é‡æ–° è¯†åˆ«
        return result["message"]
    return ''


if __name__ == "__main__":
    img_path = "./code.png"
    result = base64_api(uname='xxxxx', pwd='xxxxx', img=img_path, typeid=3)
    print(result)

import base64
import json
import requests
# ä¸€ã€å›¾ç‰‡æ–‡å­—ç±»å‹(é»˜è®¤ 3 æ•°è‹±æ··åˆ)ï¼š
# 1 : çº¯æ•°å­—
# 1001ï¼šçº¯æ•°å­—2
# 2 : çº¯è‹±æ–‡
# 1002ï¼šçº¯è‹±æ–‡2
# 3 : æ•°è‹±æ··åˆ
# 1003ï¼šæ•°è‹±æ··åˆ2
#  4 : é—ªåŠ¨GIF
# 7 : æ— æ„Ÿå­¦ä¹ (ç‹¬å®¶)
# 11 : è®¡ç®—é¢˜
# 1005:  å¿«é€Ÿè®¡ç®—é¢˜
# 16 : æ±‰å­—
# 32 : é€šç”¨æ–‡å­—è¯†åˆ«(è¯ä»¶ã€å•æ®)
# 66:  é—®ç­”é¢˜
# 49 :recaptchaå›¾ç‰‡è¯†åˆ«
# äºŒã€å›¾ç‰‡æ—‹è½¬è§’åº¦ç±»å‹ï¼š
# 29 :  æ—‹è½¬ç±»å‹
#
# ä¸‰ã€å›¾ç‰‡åæ ‡ç‚¹é€‰ç±»å‹ï¼š
# 19 :  1ä¸ªåæ ‡
# 20 :  3ä¸ªåæ ‡
# 21 :  3 ~ 5ä¸ªåæ ‡
# 22 :  5 ~ 8ä¸ªåæ ‡
# 27 :  1 ~ 4ä¸ªåæ ‡
# 48 : è½¨è¿¹ç±»å‹
#
# å››ã€ç¼ºå£è¯†åˆ«
# 18 : ç¼ºå£è¯†åˆ«ï¼ˆéœ€è¦2å¼ å›¾ ä¸€å¼ ç›®æ ‡å›¾ä¸€å¼ ç¼ºå£å›¾ï¼‰
# 33 : å•ç¼ºå£è¯†åˆ«ï¼ˆè¿”å›Xè½´åæ ‡ åªéœ€è¦1å¼ å›¾ï¼‰
# äº”ã€æ‹¼å›¾è¯†åˆ«
# 53ï¼šæ‹¼å›¾è¯†åˆ«
def base64_api(uname, pwd, img, typeid):
    with open(img, 'rb') as f:
        base64_data = base64.b64encode(f.read())
        b64 = base64_data.decode()
    data = {"username": uname, "password": pwd, "typeid": typeid, "image": b64}
    result = json.loads(requests.post("http://api.ttshitu.com/predict", json=data).text)
    if result['success']:
        return result["data"]["result"]
    else:
        #ï¼ï¼ï¼ï¼ï¼ï¼ï¼æ³¨æ„ï¼šè¿”å› äººå·¥ä¸è¶³ç­‰ é”™è¯¯æƒ…å†µ è¯·åŠ é€»è¾‘å¤„ç†é˜²æ­¢è„šæœ¬å¡æ­» ç»§ç»­é‡æ–° è¯†åˆ«
        return result["message"]
    return ""


if __name__ == "__main__":
    img_path = "C:/Users/Administrator/Desktop/file.jpg"
    result = base64_api(uname='ä½ çš„è´¦å·', pwd='ä½ çš„å¯†ç ', img=img_path, typeid=3)
    print(result)

3ï¼ŒæŠ“å–å¤šé¡µæ•°æ®

3-1 xpath ç´«ç ‚ä¹‹æ˜ŸæŠ“å–å¤šé¡µæ•°æ®

import random
import time

import requests
from lxml import etree

for i in range(1, 11):
    url = f'http://www.zishazx.com/product?page={i}&volum_start=0&volum_end=0&volum_id=0&price_start=0&price_end=0&category_id=0&pug_id=0&size_id=0&price_id=0&prize_id=0&search=&sflag=#views'
    print(f'æ­£åœ¨æŠ“å–ç¬¬{i}é¡µæ•°æ®======ã€‹')
    # ç»™è¯·æ±‚å¤´ ua
    headers = {
        'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/118.0.0.0 Safari/537.36'
    }
    # å‘èµ·getè¯·æ±‚
    res = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
    # è·å–å“åº”çš„é¡µé¢å†…å®¹
    data = res.content.decode()
    # å®ä¾‹åŒ–åŒ¹é…å¯¹è±¡
    tree = etree.HTML(data)
    # print(data)
    # è·å–åˆ°äº†æ‰€æœ‰çš„li
    li_list = tree.xpath('//ul[@class="list clearfix"]/li')
    for li in li_list:
        # è·å–åˆ°å›¾ç‰‡çš„srcåœ°å€
        img = li.xpath('./p[@class="img"]/a/img/@src')[0]
        name = li.xpath('./p[@class="name"]/text()')[0]
        p_no = li.xpath('./p[@class="p_no"]/text()')[0]
        print(img, name, p_no)
    time.sleep(random.randint(1,4))

3-2 æŠ“å–å¤šé¡µæ•°æ®æ¡ˆä¾‹

"""
http://www.cs.ecitic.com/newsite/cpzx/jrcpxxgs/zgcp/index.html   1
http://www.cs.ecitic.com/newsite/cpzx/jrcpxxgs/zgcp/index_1.html  2
http://www.cs.ecitic.com/newsite/cpzx/jrcpxxgs/zgcp/index_4.html   5
"""

import requests
import re
from lxml import etree

url = 'http://www.cs.ecitic.com/newsite/cpzx/jrcpxxgs/zgcp/index.html'
headers = {
    'User-Agent':'Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/118.0.0.0 Safari/537.36',
}

res = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
html = res.content.decode()
# print(html)
page = re.search('var countPage = (?P<page>\d+)//å…±å¤šå°‘é¡µ', html).group('page')
for i in range(int(page)+1):
    url = f'http://www.cs.ecitic.com/newsite/cpzx/jrcpxxgs/zgcp/index_{i}.html'
    if not i:
        url = f'http://www.cs.ecitic.com/newsite/cpzx/jrcpxxgs/zgcp/index.html'
    print(url)

3-3 ç™»å½•å¤„ç†

import requests
index_url = 'https://v3pro.houjiemeishi.com/PC/index.html'
headers = {
    'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/118.0.0.0 Safari/537.36',
}
session = requests.Session()
session.get(index_url, headers=headers)

# ç™»å½•çš„urlåœ°å€
login_url = 'https://v3pro.houjiemeishi.com//index.php?store_id=1&store_type=6'
# ç™»å½•æºå¸¦çš„è¡¨å•æ•°æ®
data = {
    'module': 'app_pc',
    'action': 'login',
    'm': 'login',
    'phone': 'luckyboy',
    'password': 'bHVja3lib3k=',
    'imgCode': 'flms',
    'language': '',
}
headers['Referer'] = 'https://v3pro.houjiemeishi.com/PC/pages/login/login.html'
res = session.post(login_url, data=data, headers=headers)
data = res.json()
print('ç™»å½•åè¿”å›çš„', data)
access_id = data['data']['access_id']
# æŠ“å–ä¸ªäººèµ„æ–™
own = 'https://v3pro.houjiemeishi.com//index.php?store_id=1&store_type=6'
data = {
    'module': 'app_pc',
    'action': 'user',
    'm': 'personal_resources',
    'access_id': access_id,
    'language': '',
}
headers['Referer'] = 'https://v3pro.houjiemeishi.com/PC/index.html?module=my&action=my&m=my&a=myinfor'
res = session.post(login_url, data=data, headers=headers)
print('è·å–ä¸ªäººèµ„æ–™çš„', res.json()

    # æœ€ç»ˆæ˜¯è¦è¢«æ·»åŠ åœ¨urlä¸Šé¢çš„.
    # æ­¤æ—¶, ä½ å¯ä»¥æœ‰ä¸¤ä¸ªé€‰æ‹©.

    2. æŠŠå‚æ•°å¼„å‡ºæ¥. å¼„æˆå­—å…¸. ç„¶åé€šè¿‡paramsä¼ é€’ç»™æœåŠ¡å™¨
        url = "https://movie.douban.com/j/chart/top_list"
        params = {
        type: 13
        interval_id: 100:90
        action:
        start: 0
        limit: 20
        }
        requests.get(url, params=params)
    3. è¿˜å¯ä»¥æ··åˆæ­é….

        start: 0
        limit: 20
        }

        requests.get(url, params=params)
